name: DNArcher
description:
Hello! DNArcher is a game I made in 48 hours for the annual Butterscotch Shenanijam! This is a game where you traverse the land taking genetic traits from enemies to improve or modify the way you play the game!

My Themes:

-DNA Chaos

My Achievements:

-Mozart 

-Maverick

Controls:

WASD - movement

Left Mouse - draw bow / shoot arrow

ESC - pause/view or modify traits

All assets (code, art, and music) were generated within the jam time frame.

(c) Copyright Jonathan Ouf 2019.
